X-Hive/DB 7.0.0

Package com.xhive.security

This package contains the interfaces and classes related to X-Hive/DB's JAAS support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XhiveNameHandlerIf An interface that maps instances of javax.security.auth.Subject to X-Hive/DB user names and (optionally) group names.
XhiveSecurityConfigIf An interface to manipulate the security configuration of the X-Hive/DB server.
 

Class Summary
XhiveDatabasePrincipal A principal with the X-Hive/DB database name that the subject attempts to log into or has logged into.
XhiveGroupnamePrincipal A principal with an X-Hive/DB group of the user that has logged on.
XhiveLoginModule A JAAS login module that asks for a username and a password, and checks the X-Hive/DB database for the presence of the user and the password.
XhiveNameHandler A name handler that retrieves the user and group names when using XhiveLoginModule.
XhivePrincipal A simple principal that only contains a name.
XhiveUsernamePrincipal A principal with the X-Hive/DB username that has logged on.
 

Package com.xhive.security Description

This package contains the interfaces and classes related to X-Hive/DB's JAAS support.
